General.Name: ShareHope Medicine Co Ltd
General.Description: ShareHope Medicine Co., Ltd. provides integrated medical services in Taiwan. It engages in the health management and operation activities; human resource dispatch of professional medical staff; provision of medical, pharmaceutical, and health devices, as well as long-distance health care services; and rental of medical devices. The company was founded in 2003 and is based in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 168, Ching-Kuo Road, Taoyuan City, Taiwan, 330
